comments:
CDT 200404281729
Eclipse 200404281424

Test case:
1. Start a C/C++ search and send it to the background to run
2. Close the Search view
3. Cancel the search

RESULT:  The following error is displayed to the user: Error update search
results view: Error.

The following error is written to the .log file:

A fix went in to M9 to prevent AbstractSearchViewPage from sending out a 
notification that the input has changed on the content provider. I've also 
added a check to make sure that our search result set is still around before 
trying add a new result.

- BG

Hi,

This bug still exits in M9 and needs to be reopened.

Thanks,
Pixy.

200406030301, and it passes.

Pixy.
